hotels.title: Hawaii Glamour: Waikiki Escape near Waikiki Beach with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
hotels.description: Just steps from one of the world’s most iconic shorelines, OUTRIGGER Waikiki Beachcomber Hotel is Hawaii’s first and only craft hotel - a tropical haven located near Waikiki Beach. Following a US$35 million renovation, the hotel blends contemporary island style with relaxed luxury, offering family-friendly accommodation for up to six guests, with children staying free. Brought to you by the iconic OUTRIGGER Resorts & Hotels, curated by local artists and reflecting Hawaii's unique natural landscapes and rich culture, OUTRIGGER Waikiki Beachcomber Hotel is an iconic destination set right on Kalakaua Avenue - Honolulu's vibrant shopping and entertainment precinct. The wait is over: Cirque du Soleil’s 'Auana is now open at the hotel, bringing breathtaking acrobatics, side-splitting comedy, live music and hula dancers together in a dazzling celebration of Hawai‘i’s spirit - and a 10% discount means you'll be perfectly placed to savour the spectacle. When you’ve had your fill of exploring, be sure to take advantage of the hotel's glorious pool for a refreshing dip. Grab a well-deserved pint at Maui Brewing Co. - an incredible craft brewery and bar, offering locally brewed beers, artisan cocktails and island cuisine - and savour locally grown Kona coffee and acai bowls at Hawaiian Aroma Caffe, Waikiki’s most Instagrammable coffee shop.
